project.name: Valhalla
project.description: The on-chain exchange on MegaETH. Trade perpetuals, spot, and earn more.
project.longDescription: Valhalla, the on-chain exchange, where perpetuals, spot and other DeFi primitives come together unlocking more markets, yields on collateral, and new trading primitives all on MegaETH.

features.title: Spot Trading
features.description: Trade your favourite tokens on a CLOB and AMM.

project.currentStatus: Trade perpetuals on testnet. Spot CLOB coming soon and perpetuals on-chain as well.

steps.title: Use a Refcode
steps.content:
Use a refcode ULTRA to access the platform.

After logging in you will be given your own refcode to share with friends.

steps.title: Setup Your Account
steps.content:
Sign Terms of Use, Login, and Deposit.

These will be messages that are required to guarantee the security of your account.

steps.title: Start Trading
steps.content: Trade Perpetual's like you are used to on other platforms. Enjoy!
